sj224.tflp.dice

Class ExplodingDie

  • java.lang.Object
    • sj224.tflp.dice.Die
      • sj224.tflp.dice.ExplodingDie

  • public class ExplodingDie
extends Die
    A subclass of Die for simulating die rolls with the Exploding mechanic; that is, rolling the maximum value allows you to reroll and add.
    Author:
    Johnathan Waugh

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExplodingDie(int s)
      Construct an ExplodingDie object representing an exploding die with the specified number of sides

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Description copied from class: Die
